title: Poems written by A. Cowley.
author: Cowley, Abraham, 1618-1667.
notes: Each work except the first and "Davideidos, liber primus" has special t.p.
"Davideidos, liber primus", a Latin translation of the first book of the Davideis: 23 p. at end.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
I. Miscellanies -- II. The mistress, or Love verses -- III. Pindariqve odes -- IV. Davideis, or, A sacred poem of the troubles of David.
